imdb.plot outline: Between the ages of 16 and 24, and have a 'hatke' way of doing anything and everything - pick up your handy cams, camera phones, laptop webcams or anything else and start shooting. The only rule is that the videos should be zany, wacky and related to college life. Channel [v] will select three of the best video bloggers and feature them on TV.
imdb.title: Channel V Campus Blog
plot: Channel [v] will select three of the best video bloggers and feature them on TV.

Between the ages of 16 and 24, and have a 'hatke' way of doing anything and everything - pick up your handy cams, camera phones, laptop webcams or anything else and start shooting. The only rule is that the videos should be zany, wacky and related to college life. Channel [v] will select three of the best video bloggers and feature them on TV.
